item.title: Easter Bread II
item.description: I hope you're having a nice Easter. Last year I shared a recipe from "Pantagruel" for a traditional Portuguese Easter bread, but I completely failed its presentation. So this year I decided to try a new recipe and this time from "Cozinha Tradicional Portuguesa". And I'm glad I decided to give it a try because I actually prefer this version.Â The egg in the middle is completely optional. I’ve never in my life ate the boiled egg.
